m_szDocTitle: Tesla stock up on Apple report - SFGate
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla stock up on Apple report Chronicle News Services Updated 5:21Â pm, Tuesday, February 18, 2014 AUTOMAKERS Tesla stock hits record high Tesla Motors Inc. closed above $200 for the first time amid speculation about the nature of a 2013 meeting between the electric car maker's chief, Elon Musk, and Apple Inc. 's head of mergers and acquisitions, four analysts said. Musk, Tesla's chief executive officer and co-founder, met with Apple's Adrian Perica in early 2013, The Chronicle reported Sunday, citing a person familiar with the matter. Liz Jarvis-Shean, a Tesla spokeswoman, declined to comment
